about_the_game:
Ninja Fights is a 2D side-scrolling adventure where you become a skilled ninja. Navigate through intricate levels with challenging puzzles and hidden treasures, using stealth and shurikens to overcome obstacles and enemies. Master your ninja abilities in this action-packed platformer!

About Ninja Fights

Ninja Fights invites you to immerse yourself in a thrilling 2D side-scrolling adventure. Step into the shoes of a master ninja as you traverse through 40 uniquely designed levels filled with intense challenges. Each level is packed with intricate puzzles and deadly traps that require both skill and strategy to overcome.

Key Features

Engage in epic boss fights that test your abilities and reflexes, each presenting a distinct challenge to conquer. Utilize your ninja skills, including stealth, agility, and shurikens, to navigate through treacherous environments, avoid traps, and outsmart enemies. Discover hidden treasures and secrets as you progress through the game, adding depth and replayability to your adventure.
